title: sadAsiva bhajanamE
sahitya:
sadAshiva bhajanamE janma shApalyam tarum manamE sAmba


anupallavi

  sadA samsAra sAgaratiil amizhndu tattaLittadu pOdumE iravu paghal


caraNam    ihattil sakala saubhAgyamum peralAm Ishan anbaruDan kalandinburalAm
 aghattil vaLarum nOi kavalaigaL aralAm annai vayiTril piravAp-padam peralAm
